description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Decorate gingerbread houses and share your creations with friends over Xbox Live. Have snowballs fights against your buddies or enemy gingerbread men. Try it out!
description.short: Decorate gingerbread houses and share your creations with friends over Xbox Live. Have snowballs fights against your buddies or enemy gingerbread men. Try it out!
